original_text: You do not know what will happen tomorrow. Your life is like a cloud which appears for a short time and then it quickly goes away.
korean_text: 내일 일을 너희가 알지 못하는도다 너희 생명이 무엇이냐 너희는 잠깐 보이다가 없어지는 안개니라

sentences.original_text: You do not know what will happen tomorrow
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내일 무슨 일이 일어날지 알지 못한다

sentences.original_text: Your life is like a cloud
which appears for a short time
and then it quickly goes away
